V05n749:202: saṃghe hi bhiḍyamāne hi nābalaṃ kiñcimanyatām ||4 ||

V05n749:230: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bhikṣuṇāṃ tayā īryayā vipratipattyā anāttamanā anabhirāddhastata eva ṛddhyā upari vihāyasā pra(krānto)

V05n749:243: nāyaṃ bhavanta eṣām doṣaḥ kiṃ tvasmākaṃ ye vayamebhyaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ prayacchāmaḥ vāksaṃbhāṣaṇaṃ vā |

V05n749:273: te'smāṃścodayiṣyanti smārayiṣyanti alajjitena vā vaitareṇa vā |

V05n749:282: gacchāmi bhagavantamavalokayāmi teṣāṃ mayā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti viditvā yena bhagavāmstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n749:283: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |

V05n749:337: sādhu sādhu bhikṣo bahupuṇyaṃ prasūyate aprameyamasaṃkhyeyamaparimāṇaṃ yo bhikṣuṇāṃ kalahajātānāṃ viharatāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānām vigṛhītānāṃ vivādamāpannānāṃ pakṣāparapakṣavyavasthitānāṃ saṃdhiṃ karoti sāmagrīm |
V05n749:338: yathā hi nāma kaścicchataśacchinnaṃ bālaṃ koṭyā pratisandadhyādevameva bahupuṇyaṃ prasūyate aprameyamasaṃkhyeyamaparimāṇaṃ yo bhikṣuṇāṃ kalahajātānāṃ viharatām pūrvavadyāvatsandhiṃ karoti sāmagrīm |
V05n749:342: śayannāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīmākoṭya pṛṣṭavācikayā bhikśūnsamanuyujya sarvasaṃghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite yathāvṛddhikayā sagauraveṇa sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā vṛddhānte utkṛṭukena niṣadyāñjaliṃ pragṛhya idaṃ syādvacanīyam |
V05n749:344: yannidānaṃ mamotpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādo yadutāpanna iti vā anāpanna iti vā utkṣiptaka iti vā anutkṣiptaka iti vā sohamāpanno nānāpannaḥ utkṣipto nānutkṣiptaḥ |
V05n749:351: tataḥ paścādekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam |
V05n749:353: yannidānamapyāyuṣmanta utpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādp yadutāpanna iti vā |
V05n749:361: sa cetsaṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyātsaṃgho yatsaṃgha evaṃnāmānaṃ bhikśumosārayediti |
V05n749:362: sa cetsaṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyātsaṃgho yatsaṃgha evaṃnāmānaṃ bhikṣumosārayediti |
V05n749:366: yannidānamasyāyuṣmata utpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ pūrvavadyāvat |
V05n749:373: yannidānamasyāyuṣmata utpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ pūrvavad (yāvad) |
V05n749:388: yannidānaṃ mamotpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādo yadutāpanna iti vā anāpanna iti vā |
V05n749:389: utkṣipta iti vā anutkṣipta iti vā |
V05n749:393: tena mayā evaṃnāmnā utkṣiptakena bhikṣuṇā sṃġhādosāraṇā yācit ā |
V05n749:396: dadātu bhadantaḥ saṃgho mamaivaṃnāmna osāritasya bhikṣoḥ saṃghasāmagrīm |
V05n749:400: tataḥ paścādekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam |
V05n749:402: yannidānamasyāyuṣmata utpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādo yadutāpanna iti pūrvavad (yāvat) |
V05n749:403: sa cetsaṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānu jānīyātsaṃgho yatsaṃgha evaṃnāmnaḥ osāraṇīyakarmakṛtasya bhikṣoḥ sāmagrīṃ dadyāditi |
V05n749:407: yannidānamasyāyuṣmata utpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādo yadutāpannaḥ pūrvavadyāvaddāttā saṃghena evaṃnāmnaḥ osāraṇīyakarmakṛtasya bhikṣoḥ sāmagrī |
V05n749:410: ityasya saṃghena osāraṇīyakarmakṛtasya bhikṣoḥ sāmagrī dattā bhavati |
V05n749:418: dadātu bhadantaḥ saṃghaḥ mamaivaṃnāmnah sāmagrīdattakasya bhikṣoḥ samagrīpoṣadhamanukampāmupādāya |
V05n749:421: tataḥ paścādekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam |
V05n749:423: yannidānamasyāyuṣmata utpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādo yadutāpanna iti vā pūrvavadyāvat |
V05n749:425: sa cetsaṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyātsaṃgho yatsaṃghaḥ evaṃnāmnaḥ saṃghasāmagrīdattakasy abhikṣoḥ sāmgarīpoṣadhaṃ ddyāditi |
V05n749:429: yannidānamasyāyuṣmata utpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādo yadutāpanna iti vā anāpanna iti vā pūrvavadyāvat |
V05n749:431: tatsaṃgha evaṃnāmnah sāmagrīdattakasyaḥ bhikṣoḥ sāmagrīpoṣadham dadāti |
V05n749:432: eṣāmāyuṣmatām kṣamante evaṃnāmnaḥ sāmagrīdattakasya bhikṣoḥ sāmagrīpoṣadhaṃ dātum |
V05n749:436: dattaḥ saṃghena evaṃnāmnaḥ saṃghasāṃagrīdattakasyaḥ bhikṣoḥ sāmagrīpoṣadhaḥ |
V05n749:438: yasya saṃghena sāmagrīdattakasya bhikṣoḥ sāmagrīpoṣadho datto bhavati tena sārdhaṃ saṃghenaikatye niṣadya poṣadhaḥ kartavyaḥ pravāraṇā jñaptiḥ jñaptidvitīyaṃ jñapticaturthaṃ karma |
